challenges.title: Day 1
challenges.challengeText: Merry <Code>mas! I've devised some programming challenges and ideas just for you! I would love your program to be more festive, can you add customisable themes so I can make all the buttons red and green for Christmas?

challenges.title: Day 2
challenges.challengeText: I'm curious whether Wordle would be more difficult with 6 letter words or 3 letter words, could you build a version that would let me try them out?

challenges.title: Day 3
challenges.challengeText: I've found this website of interesting challenges. Choose one for us both to do, then we can compare how we did it. Maybe even make it into a blog post?

challenges.title: Day 4
challenges.challengeText: When I'm looking after the chickens you still need your Eggio data! How about adding a tool to your website where I could log what eggs I find? You could hide it behind a password so you don't get fake entries

challenges.title: Day 5
challenges.challengeText: Maybe you can combine your coding and table tennis skills somehow. Either for a scoring system or, more interestingly, for spin calculations.

challenges.title: Day 6
challenges.challengeText: There are many cool APIs available publicly, find one that interests you to make a new feature for your website!

challenges.title: Day 7
challenges.challengeText: You made it to the end of <code>mas! We should play a game to celebrate, can you make one we can play together remotely?
